org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate

Class PersistCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.impl.ChainImpl
      • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.AbstractSessionCommand
        • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.PersistCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xchain.Chain, org.xchain.Command

    @Element(localName="persist")
public abstract class PersistCommand
extends AbstractSessionCommand

    The persist command will execute a Hibernate persist on the session with the specified entity. For more information about the persist method, refer to the Hibernate documentation.

    This must reference an active session.

    <xchain:session xmlns:xchain="http://www.xchain.org/hibernate/1.0"> <xchain:transaction> ... <xchain:persist entity="$myEntity"> ... </xchain:transaction> </xchain:session>
    Author:
    Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble
    See Also:
    SessionCommand, Session.persist(Object)

        public boolean execute(org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)

        Persist the entity at the given QName. Note that persist will only perform an insert if it is within a transaction.
